title: Government condemns the Rhodes Park Attack (Department of Government Communication & Information System - Republic ...
text: ( Source : Department of Government Communication & Information System - Republic of South Africa ) 19 Oct 2015 Government condemns the attack on the two couples, which resulted in one of the women being raped and the two men killed and
